data.sampled:
I believe the answer to this riddle is "sky" and "earth". Here is my reasoning:

🏰 represents an airplane, which can fly over the sky.
🌃 represents a world, which is the earth.
When you put both together, you get "airplaneworld".

If you replace "airplaneworld" with "sky", it becomes "skyy". Then "y" + "e" becomes "ye", which is a shortened version of "earth".

Putting it together, "skyy" becomes "sky" and "ye" becomes "earth", which is the correct answer to the Emoji Riddle.
